amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 4, 6, 7, 9, 13, 18, 36, 37, 38, 44, 48, 53, 57, 60, 61, 62, 66, 75, 84, 93, 94, 95, 100, 103, 106, 109, 115, 117, 124, 125, 126, 127, 136, 139, 141, and 146.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
